idea: Museum of Exotic Teas is the brain child of Ms Ritumbhara Agarwal, a tea pioneer born in a Darjeeling planters family with extensive knowledge and exposure to the tea industry since childhood. Through her venture, she aims to work in close relation with small farmers and planters association and help them build a brand image for their produce. Through premium retail packaging of high quality teas, the company strives to bring the small farmers association into the consumer forefront and increase their revenue and build a sustainable livelihood.
name: Museum of Exotic Teas LLP

idea:
Aiolos Cloud Solutions Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 19 August 2020. It is classified as Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Mumbai. Aiolos Cloud Solutions is the Cloud vertical of Aiolos Solutions, a 3-year-old, venture funded, in-stealth, technology solutions company that services Fortune 500s (MasterCard, Worldline Global, Starbucks, Whirlpool Corp, PayPal, CitiCorp)

Our Offerings
- We employ our proprietary “Ground Up from Ground Zero” methodology to identify, classify & architect the solution to your problem statement.
- We design end-to-end 'cloudification' strategy to deploy your on-premise applications on cloud.
- We build highly customized integrated frameworks to adopt cloud native services in AWS/Azure/GCP or build in-data center IaaS/PaaS capabilities whilst deploying a private cloud.
- We improve operational efficiency/cost driven optimization via various custom-developed user-centric dashboards.
name: AIOLOS CLOUD SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
